src_original: yathā yathā kāmasukheṣu vartate tathā tathecchā viṣayeṣu varddhate // Saund_9.43 //
tgt_original: yathā yathā kāmasukheṣu vartate tathā tathecchā viṣayeṣu varddhate ||43 ||

src_original: yathā ca kuṣṭhavyasanena duḥkhitaḥ pratāpanānnaiva śamaṃ nigacchati /
tgt_original: yathā ca kuṣṭhavyasanena duḥkhitaḥ pratāpanānnaiva śamaṃ nigacchati |

src_original: tathendriyārtheṣvajitendriyaścaranna kāmabhogairupaśāntimṛcchati // Saund_9.44 //
tgt_original: tathendriyārtheṣvajitendriyaścaranna kāmabhogairupaśāntimṛcchati ||44 ||

src_original: yathā hi bhaiṣajyasukhābhikāṅkṣayā bhajeta rogānna bhajeta tatkṣamam /
tgt_original: yathā hi bhaiṣajyasukhābhikāṅkṣayā bhajeta rogānna bhajeta tatkṣamam |

src_original: tathā śarīre bahuduḥkhabhājane rameta mohād viṣayābhikāṅkṣayā // Saund_9.45 //
tgt_original: tathā śarīre bahuduḥkhabhājane rameta mohād viṣayābhikāṅkṣayā ||45 ||

src_original: anarthakāmaḥ puruṣasya yo janaḥ sa tasya śatruḥ kila tena karmaṇā /
tgt_original: anarthakāmaḥ puruṣasya yo janaḥ sa tasya śatruḥ kila tena karmaṇā |

src_original: anarthamūlā viṣayāśca kevalā nanu praheyā viṣamā yathārayaḥ // Saund_9.46 //
tgt_original: anarthamūlā viṣayāśca kevalā nanu praheyā viṣamā yathārayaḥ ||46 ||

src_original: ihaiva bhūtvā ripavo vadhātmakāḥ prayānti kāle puruṣasya mitratāṃ /
tgt_original: ihaiva bhūtvā ripavo vadhātmakāḥ prayānti kāle puruṣasya mitratāṃ |

src_original: paratra caiveha ca duḥkhahetavo bhavanti kāmā na tu kasyacicchivāḥ // Saund_9.47 //
tgt_original: paratra caiveha ca duḥkhahetavo bhavanti kāmā na tu kasyacicchivāḥ ||47 ||

src_original: yathopayuktaṃ rasavarṇagandhavad vadhāya kimpākaphalaṃ na puṣṭaye /  niṣevyamāṇā viṣayāścalātmano bhavantyanarthāya tathā na bhūtaye // Saund_9.48 //
tgt_original: yathopayuktaṃ rasavarṇagandhavad vadhāya kimpākaphalaṃ na puṣṭaye |  niṣevyamāṇā viṣayāścalātmano bhavantyanarthāya tathā na bhūtaye ||48 ||

src_original: tadetadājñāya vipāpmanātmanā vimokṣadharmādyupasahitaṃ hitam /
tgt_original: tadetadājñāya vipāpmanātmanā vimokṣadharmādyupasahitaṃ hitam |

src_original: juṣasva me sajjanasaṃmataṃ mataṃ pracakṣva vā niścayamud giran giram // Saund_9.49 //
tgt_original: juṣasva me sajjanasaṃmataṃ mataṃ pracakṣva vā niścayamud giran giram ||49 ||

src_original: iti hitamapi bahvapīdamuktaḥ śrutamahatā śramaṇena tena nandaḥ /
tgt_original: iti hitamapi bahvapīdamuktaḥ śrutamahatā śramaṇena tena nandaḥ |

src_original: na dhṛtimupayayau na śarma lebhe dvirada ivātimado madāndhacetāḥ // Saund_9.50 //
tgt_original: na dhṛtimupayayau na śarma lebhe dvirada ivātimado madāndhacetāḥ ||50 ||
